entries.upholstery: A large swath of generic upholstery.
entries.torch_module: A torch module, the most basic unit of a torch.
entries.lighting_module: A lighting module, a basic unit of torch or light creation.
entries.shade: A shade, used in making lamps.
entries.neck: A neck, used in crafting items such as lamps.
entries.valving: Some valving, generally used in creating instruments.
entries.painting_schematic_blumbush: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce a painting of a blumbush.

entries.painting_schematic_boffa: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce a painting of a boffa plant.

entries.painting_schematic_golden_flower_02: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce an abstract painting of golden petals - second in the series.
entries.painting_schematic_golden_flower_03: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce an abstract painting of golden petals - third in the series.
entries.painting_schematic_house: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce a painting of a residential house.
entries.painting_schematic_krayt_skeleton: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce a painting of a krayt dragon skeleton.
entries.painting_schematic_lucky_despot: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce a painting of the Lucky Despot wreckage.
entries.painting_schematic_mattberry: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce a painting of mattberry plant.
entries.painting_schematic_rainbow_berry_bush: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce a painting of a rainbow berry bush.
entries.painting_schematic_moncal_eye_01: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce a painting of a Mon Calamari eye - first in the series.
entries.painting_schematic_moncal_eye_02: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce a painting of a Mon Calamari eye - second in the series.
entries.painting_schematic_ronka: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce a painting of a ronka plant.
entries.painting_schematic_raventhorn: A document containing the information necessary to reproduce a painting of a raventhorn plant.
entries.dual_wave_synthesizer: This device is adequately capable of reproducing the sound of almost any musical instrument.
entries.integrated_circuit: Circuitry used in cybernetics to control motor function.
